text: Lingwa de planeta (also Lidepla or LdP) is a constructed international auxiliary language.Статья в журнале СПбГУ (№ 13 (3855) 26 ОКТЯБРЯ 2012) It uses words from the ten most widely spoken languages in the world: Arabic, Chinese, English, Spanish, German, Hindi, Persian, Portuguese, Russian and French.Journal of Universal Language == Example of text == The Lord's Prayer in Lingwa de Planeta: :Nuy Patra kel es pa swarga, :hay Yur nam fa-sante, :hay Yur reging lai, :hay yur vola fulfil :i pa arda i pa swarga. :Dai ba a nu nuy pan fo jivi sedey :e pardoni ba a nu nuy deba, :kom nu pardoni toy-las kel debi a nu. :Bye dukti nu inu temta :e protekti nu fon bada. == References == Category:Constructed languages
title: Lingwa de planeta
